Html:
Undeath Deck  Darkmoon Undeath Deck  Ace of Undeath, Two of Undeath, Three of Undeath, Four of Undeath, Five of Undeath, Six of Undeath, Seven of Undeath, Eight of Undeath  Darkmoon Card: Death

Darkmoon Card: Death
Binds when picked up
Unique
Trinket Trinket
Requires Level 80
Equip: Improves haste rating by 85.
Equip: Each time you deal damage, you have a chance to do an additional 744 to 956 Shadow damage.

I could not find Darkmoon Card: Death in the list of trinket options, wondering if I missed it?

If not, is there any chance this will be included in the next version?

Also, has anyone seen any math done on this card?

If you're using Rawr.Moonkin (I notice you made another discussion post on Moonkin rotation options), the trinket's math has been calculated.  Add it manually to the item list by using Tools->Edit Items... and it will appear in the trinket list.  According to WoWHead, it has a 35% proc chance and a 45-second internal cooldown, which greatly limits its power and makes it a decidedly unattractive trinket option, even despite the 85 haste rating.
